channel.title: Need help editing a flash template! Whats Wrong?
channel.description: I got a flash template from a website and now everytime I try opening it with macromedia flash 8 it opens all messed up. Heres a video of what happens http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=PTCYbx_DPRY please help me! On the video first I open the file and it comes out normal. Then I open it on macromedia flash 8 to edit it and it opens the template all messed up whats wrong?????

item.title: Need help editing a flash template! Whats Wrong?
item.dc:creator: @kloplop321 kloplop321
item.description:
@kloplop321 wrote:

Macromedia has done that to prevent people to steal other people’s flash’s and a good way to make sure ppl can’t steal it at all is: put a password on it and put most of it in a movie clip, other than the preloader

Read full topic
item.source: Need help editing a flash template! Whats Wrong?

item.title: Need help editing a flash template! Whats Wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

xsteelersx86x:

I turned it into .fla but it still does the same thing…

LOL, changing the file extension won’t make it magically work

item.title: Need help editing a flash template! Whats Wrong?
item.dc:creator: @Exernet Exernet
item.description:
@Exernet wrote:

You can’t edit .swf files… You either need the .fla or you need to decompile the .swf

Read full topic
